verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD אַשְׁרֵי־ <S%H835><s%> 'ash-rei- Blessed אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish [is] the man יָרֵ֣א <S%H3372><s%> ya-Re [that] feareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD בְּ֝מִצְוֹתָ֗יו <S%H4687><s%> be-mitz-vo-Tav, in his commandments חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fetz [that] delighteth מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. greatly

גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor shall be mighty בָּ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> Ba-'a-retz upon earth יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'O; His seed דּ֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor the generation יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> ye-sha-Rim of the upright יְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> ye-vo-Rach. shall be blessed

הוֹן־ <S%H1952><s%> hon- Wealth וָעֹ֥שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> va-'O-sher and riches בְּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-To; [shall be] in his house וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-To, and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad. for ever

זָ֘רַ֤ח <S%H2224><s%> za-Rach there ariseth בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ba-Cho-shech in the darkness א֭וֹר <S%H216><s%> or light לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים <S%H3477><s%> lay-sha-Rim; Unto the upright חַנּ֖וּן <S%H2587><s%> chan-Nun [he is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> ve-ra-Chum and full of compassion וְצַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> ve-tzad-Dik. and righteous

טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> tov- A good אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man חוֹנֵ֣ן <S%H2603><s%> cho-Nen sheweth favour וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <S%H3867><s%> u-mal-Veh; and lendeth יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <S%H3557><s%> ye-chal-Kel he will guide דְּבָרָ֣יו <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav his affairs בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> be-mish-Pat. with discretion

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> yim-Mot; Surely he shall not be moved לְזֵ֥כֶר <S%H2143><s%> le-Ze-cher remembrance ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, shall be in everlasting יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik. the righteous

מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה <S%H8052><s%> mish-she-mu-'Ah tidings רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> Ra-'ah of evil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo He will not יִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> yi-Ra; He shall not be afraid נָכ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon is fixed לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, his heart בָּטֻ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> ba-Tu-ach trusting בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. in the LORD

סָמ֣וּךְ <S%H5564><s%> sa-Much [is] established לִ֭בּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-bo His heart לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo he will not יִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> yi-Ra; he shall not be afraid עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad Until אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- he יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh until he see בְצָרָֽיו׃ <S%H6862><s%> ve-tza-Rav. [his desire] upon his enemies

פִּזַּ֤ר׀ <S%H6340><s%> piz-Zar He hath dispersed נָ֘תַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan he hath given לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <S%H34><s%> la-'ev-yo-Nim, to the poor צִ֭דְקָתוֹ <S%H6666><s%> tzid-ka-to his righteousness עֹמֶ֣דֶת <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad; for ever קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ <S%H7161><s%> kar-No, his horn תָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> ta-Rum shall be exalted בְּכָבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> be-cha-Vod. with honour

רָ֘שָׁ֤ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' The wicked יִרְאֶ֨ה׀ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh shall see וְכָעָ֗ס <S%H3707><s%> ve-cha-'As, [it] and be grieved שִׁנָּ֣יו <S%H8127><s%> shin-Nav with his teeth יַחֲרֹ֣ק <S%H2786><s%> ya-cha-Rok he shall gnash וְנָמָ֑ס <S%H4549><s%> ve-na-Mas; and melt away תַּאֲוַ֖ת <S%H8378><s%> ta-'a-Vat the desire רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> to-Ved. shall perish
